description: Initial T: Bust Portrait of a Bearded Man; Cristoforo Cortese (Italian, active Venice, Italy 1390 - 1445); Venice, Veneto, Italy; early 15th century; Tempera colors, pen and ink, and gold leaf on parchment bound between wood boards covered with red velvet; Leaf: 36.8 x 26 cm (14 1/2 x 10 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIV 8, fol. 136; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
